meanings.definition: An examination or inspection to assess one's health or progress.
meanings.sent1: Regular checkups help keep you healthy.
meanings.sent2: I have a dental checkup scheduled for next week.
meanings.sent3: The checkup results showed I need to eat more vegetables.
meanings.sent4: Her daily exercise routine was like a checkup for her fitness level.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's thorough checkup revealed no issues.

meanings.definition: A routine visit to a doctor or dentist for evaluation.
meanings.sent1: My mom took me for my checkup at the dentist.
meanings.sent2: Annual checkups are important for maintaining good health.
meanings.sent3: The checkup at the doctor's office was quick and easy.
meanings.sent4: His dental checkup was like a tune-up for his teeth.
meanings.sent5: The checkup revealed that everything was in perfect condition.

meanings.definition: A process of verifying or confirming something.
meanings.sent1: The accountant performed a financial checkup on the company.
meanings.sent2: Double-checking your work is a good practice.
meanings.sent3: The checkup of the data confirmed the accuracy of the report.
meanings.sent4: Her investigation was a thorough checkup of the facts.
meanings.sent5: The security checkup ensured everything was secure.
